page.title: 20 PEOPLE AND HOUSES
page.content: The housing behind the Leeds Road shops is mostly old terraced,dating back to Victorian times. The inhab- itants enjoy living there. There are also dislikes: one of them is Hookstone Road with all its heavy traffic;the people also dislike parked cars on the pavements.Most of the people have lived there all their lives or else lived in nearby streets because they like the area.On the other side of Hookstone Road the houses are detatched,semi-detatched or bungalows and are more modern.Most people use the Leeds Road shops rather than going to town.Many of the houses were built around 1940.The houses on Coronation Grove,Coronation Avenue and Coronation Road were built in 1900.At the end of Coronation Grove there is a carpet warehouse which used to be a cotton mill.
